channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- visionOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- visionOS

item.title: CVE-2024-40865|2024-09-06T13:17:43.102Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed by suspending Persona when the virtual keyboard is active. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.3. Inputs to the virtual keyboard may be inferred from Persona.

item.title: CVE-2024-27812|2024-08-02T00:41:55.785Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improvements to the file handling protocol. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.2. Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27812|2024-06-11T16:24:44.457Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improvements to the file handling protocol. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.2. Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improvements to the file handling protocol. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.2. Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2024-40865|2024-09-06T01:23:53.981Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed by suspending Persona when the virtual keyboard is active. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.3. Inputs to the virtual keyboard may be inferred from Persona.
